title: Khwlw khwlw, Alw-alw
lyrics:
Khwlw khwlw, Alw-alw
Rongza -rongza, hanza-hanza -2
Gwsw khwuse jwngha, Jiu-a mwnse jwngha -2
(A)
Gwswanw jwngha birkhangw
Jiuanw jwngha mwsaglangw -2
Phwrbu be jiua nwngni
Susradw wdhwrwm jwngni -2
Gole-gole gabjriyw jwng, Phwrbu nwngkhou
(B)
Phwrbuni thwnnaikhou jwng lagwn
Phwrbuni girjayao jwng thagwn -2
Swithwkhou jwngbw hastayw
Dwhwmkhou jwngbw sibiyw -2
Sukhublabw dukhublabw, Jiuao gwkhrwng
